HeroSection.title: Innovate, Create, Elevate.
HeroSection.subtitle: Tech Vision is your strategic partner in the world of digitalization. We build advanced solutions that drive growth and transform businesses.

Footer.EnAyman: Programmed and Developed by Engineer Ayman Al-Zahabi
Footer.aboutParagraph: We are a team of passionate developers, designers, and strategists dedicated to crafting exceptional digital experiences.
Footer.visionText: To be a leading force in digital innovation, shaping the future of technology for businesses worldwide.
Footer.valuesText: Integrity, collaboration, and a relentless pursuit of excellence.

PartnersSection.title: Trusted by the world's most innovative teams

AboutSection.title: About Tech Vision
AboutSection.paragraph: We are a team of passionate developers, designers, and strategists dedicated to crafting exceptional digital experiences. Our mission is to empower businesses with technology that is not only powerful but also user-friendly and elegant.
AboutSection.visionText: To be a leading force in digital innovation, shaping the future of technology for businesses worldwide.
AboutSection.valuesText: Integrity, collaboration, and a relentless pursuit of excellence.

ServicesSection.title: Our Services
ServicesSection.subtitle: We offer a comprehensive suite of technical services designed to help you achieve your business goals.

WhyChooseUsSection.title: Why Choose Tech Vision?
WhyChooseUsSection.subtitle: We don't just build products; we build partnerships. Our commitment to excellence and innovation sets us apart.

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: We adhere to the highest standards to deliver robust and reliable solutions.

agile.title: Agility & Speed
agile.description: Our agile methodology ensures rapid development and on-time delivery.

customer.title: Customer-Centric
customer.description: We work closely with you to understand your vision and bring it to reality.

Dialog.title: Project Details
Dialog.description: Explore the details of this project.

PortfolioSection.title: Our Work
PortfolioSection.subtitle: We are proud of the solutions we have delivered. Explore some of our recent projects.

TeamSection.title: Meet Our Team
TeamSection.subtitle: The brilliant minds behind our success.

TestimonialsSection.title: What Our Clients Say
TestimonialsSection.subtitle: We have helped businesses of all sizes achieve their goals. Here's what they have to say.

items.q1: What is the typical project timeline?
items.a1: Project timelines vary depending on scope and complexity. A standard website might take 4-6 weeks, while a complex web application could take several months. We provide a detailed timeline after our initial consultation.
items.q2: How do you handle project management?
items.a2: We use agile methodologies and tools like Jira or Trello to manage projects. You will have a dedicated project manager and regular check-ins to keep you updated on progress.
items.a3: Yes, we offer various support and maintenance packages to ensure your application remains secure, up-to-date, and running smoothly.
items.q4: What technologies do you specialize in?
items.a4: We specialize in modern web technologies including React, Next.js, Node.js, and various cloud platforms like AWS and Google Cloud. We select the best tech stack for your specific needs.

CtaSection.title: Ready to start your next project?
CtaSection.subtitle: Let's build something great together. Contact us today for a free consultation and quote.

ContactSection.title: Contact Us
ContactSection.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Fill out the form and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
